channel.title: First Steps on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in First Steps on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Introduction
item.description: First steps Introduction The Upgrade App was developed for customers who are upgrading from a system up to BC14 to a newer Business Central version and who are also upgrading from the Connector NAV/BC to the Connector 365 Apps. Since there are differences in the technical implementation between the Connector NAV/BC and the Connector 365 Apps, it is necessary to transfer the table data belonging to the Connector NAV/BC to the new tables of the Connector 365 Apps.

item.title: Testing & Purchasing
item.description: Testing and purchasing the Connector 365 Upgrade App Here you will find all the important information and instructions on how to test and purchase the Connector 365 Upgrade App. Just use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be happy to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the support page.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installing the Connector 365 Upgrade App Here you will find all the important information and instructions on how to install the Connector 365 Upgrade App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we are happy to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the support page.

item.title: Setup
item.description: Setting up the Connector 365 Upgrade App Here you will find all the important information and instructions on how to set up the Connector 365 Upgrade App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered for you, we will be happy to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the support page.
